snippet: After protests halted the funeral of the former Nazi Erich Priebke, who was associated with a World War II massacre, the question of how to dispose of his remains was unresolved.
abstract: Protests in Italy halt furtively organized funeral of Erich Priebke, former SS captain associated with a World War II massacre, leaving former Nazi's corpse laying at military airport near Rome, waiting for resolution.
lead_paragraph: After protests halted the funeral of the former Nazi Erich Priebke, who was associated with a World War II massacre, the question of how to dispose of his remains was unresolved.

headline.main: Italy: No Solution on Burial of Ex-Nazi
headline.print_headline: Italy: No Solution on Burial of Ex-Nazi
